jd: Hi Please share suitable resume for Lead Data Specialist with Pharma domain, need 10+ years of experience candidate, also need local from New jersey or NY who can go onsite at Plainsboro NJ Role: Lead Data SpecialistLocation: Plainsboro NJ – 3Days per week hybridContract IICS, Snowflake, SQL· Extensive Hands-on in data warehouse designing· Hands on in Informatica skills with excellent problem-solving capability.· Ability to lead the team and guide them through difficult situations.· Excellent communication and articulation skills.· Presentable skills to Business and technical teams.· Through understanding for dimension and facts.· Need to have a Problem solver attitude.· Understanding of Pharma domain with respect to Life Science datasets from IQVIA, Komodo, VEEVA tool sets· Expertise with Snowflake DWH in terms of architecture and optimization· Experience with Informatica Power centre and IICS· Strong business communication· Good to have Pharma domain experience.· Build and lead solution charter in areas of data engineering· Comfortable with technical details like building first cut architecture design· Razor sharp skills on execution of small to large programs· Ability to work in ambiguous situations with unstructured problems and anticipate potential issues/risks· Experience in handling complex information and presenting it in compelling narratives through business presentations for various audiences· Professional agility and strategic thinking· Ability to write and design technical business process documentation· Excellent project management, relationship building and organizational skills
